title: Still being punished??
body:
Had my first EVER chat ban for 10 games the other day, also with slow Q times.

Did those, played nice, still says after like 15 games I can't win prizes even though Im getting S's . If the punishments are over, why can't I get boxes or keys?

replies.body: It's going to be a while. You've got to convince the system that you're positive, not just neutral, now. Be friendly to everyone in game, give out honors and say "honor all" at the end.

> Had my first EVER chat ban for 10 games the other day

Why is that?  What reason were you given?
i was toxic by calling out the people on my teams who were feeding. I used bad language thats  wrong, but apparently going 4/15 is perfectly acceptable

It's the "calling out" that's unacceptable. It's just uselessly harassing somebody who is already having a bad game. If honestly believe they are deliberately feeding then report then at the end. There's no need to say anything at all to them.

> Hayes (NA)  - 2 minutes ago
i was toxic by calling out the people on my teams who were feeding. I used bad language thats wrong, but apparently going 4/15 is perfectly acceptable

We all know that language alone doesn't cause a ban,  unless so rude most of us don't care about a few curse words. 

Are you saying that the person who had a bad game was the problem?    Okay, if you think that.
-------------------------

I want to see the message Riot gave you for your ban!  Provide that and we can talk :) K ?
on average takes 3 months to begin receiving rewards again.
loot is for positiv players and it can take a long time for you to redeem yourself as a positiv member of the community. stay positiv and you will get loot again at some point
